channel.title: nc on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in nc on LS | Papermod

item.title: Laura's Family Vacation in Mexico, Part 1
item.description: An innocent family vacation turns wild for 12 year old Laura.

item.title: Helping Out a Friend, Sort Of, Part 1
item.description: A woman asks her boyfriend to take her profligate daughter away and train her to behave, as he had done with his own daughter. He agrees and 'kidnaps' the daughter,taking her to a secluded spot for a couple of weeks, and punishing her.

item.title: Mom' Heels
item.description: A girl ties her father down, wears her mother's heels and uses him.

item.title: The Storytellers' Tales, Part 1
item.description: Taking the 1812 version of Little Snow White to the next level with just a few extra pieces.

item.title: Babysitting Justin, Part 1
item.description: Toddler Justin's babysitter is a horny teenage boy.

item.title: Samantha AKA Sam is Shy
item.description: Tom has a chance of a lifetime to help Samantha get over her shyness.

item.title: Homeless in Seattle, Part 1
item.description: A man gets caught playing with his daughter, and is forced to live out on his own -- homeless. Eventually a situation presents itself nearly gift wrapped.

item.title: Miranda's Rites
item.description: Little girl gets nabbed stealing.

item.title: Too Young to Party, Part 1
item.description: A 12 year old girl calls her big brother for a ride home when she and her bff got drunk. The big brother arrives to find two girls that are not arguing about anything that happens to them.

item.title: Big Favors
item.description: Slutty, submissive mom Jenny tells us about how her dominant friend Jenny decides to use her as breeding stock.

item.title: Doing Everything
item.description: 16-year old Jerry is obsessed with his 11-year old sister Ashley, as is their step-father. What Jerry sees while peeping on his kid sister today changes both of their lives for the better.

item.title: Jennifer's Camp-Out, Part 1
item.description: It's Jennifer's 8th birthday, and she has her friends over. On a warm summer evening, the girls soon get too warm...

item.title: The Erotic Babysitter
item.description: I regularly get asked to babysit for my friends toddler Kerry, this time was different...

item.title: Getting to Know Step-Mother, Part 1
item.description: Barbara learns quickly that her step-mother and step-brother are cruel and devious. Things get even worse after her father dies. She soon realizes that she is doomed to a life of pain and suffering.

item.title: Molly and the Babysitting Advert
item.description: A naive teenager falls prey to an evil paedophile. Initially being forced so comes to start to realise her place and enjoys it.

item.title: Abducting Nice 10yo Abigail
item.description: This is part 17 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah is taking a break from the story for a while, as she has been taken on holiday by her schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Here Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, carry out their abduction of Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). Can be read from here, but makes more sense if you have followed the previous stories.

item.title: The Rape Of Abigail
item.description: This is part 18 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah is taking a break from the story for a while, as she has been taken on holiday by her schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Here Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, are carrying out their planned abduction and rape of Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). They have her in a clearing, in the woods, having already forced her to strip and subjected her to fondling and kissing and cowed her by threats, which was not difficult.

item.title: The Incident At Cherry Lake, Part 2
item.description: “Who are you Mister?” the young girl asked as she slowly approached Derick in the semi-dark bed room. Derick had broken in to rob the place, but had forgotten to lock the door, and been caught in the act by this girl. He was so surprised by her presence that he couldn’t move, or say anything, but then as she got closer, she surprised him even more. She lifted her little dress, holding it up with her chin, and then reached down, pulling her panties to her knees, revealing her fat, hairless outer labia with her tight little slit.

item.title: The Incident At Cherry Lake, Part 1
item.description: Derick is a professional thief, but when he decides to take a working vacation to Cherry Lake, choosing Jackie, and her three daughters (Jill-14, Jenny-13, and Jessica-12) he ends up getting more than he bargained for.

item.title: Naughty Little Girls Of The Training Hostel, Part 1
item.description: Introduction The Connor Hostel was well known in the district. Like most Hostels, it was for the disciplinary training and education of young girls. Some girls attended only in the summer. Others were there all year long, in accordance to their parents’ wishes, and spent their entire schooling at such institutions. The Connor Hostel however restricted attendance to girls from ten to fourteen…regulation age of course. Madam Hinshar set these rules, for the Hostel was hers, completely hers.

item.title: Loving Teacher, Part 1
item.description: Samantha Hargraves loved being a teacher, it was all she had dreamed of being since she was a little girl. She was an excellent teacher, mostly due to the great love she had for her students. She had studied hard throughout her years in public school and then gone on to study at university, and all that time she had harbored a dark, twisted, little secret. Samantha Hargraves loved little girls.
